noun.definition: The feeling or expression of reverence and adoration for a deity.
Adoration or honor paid to a thing or person.
noun.example: He had a look of worship on his face.

verb.definition: Show reverence and adoration for (a deity); honor with religious rites.
verb.example: They worship in the traditional manner.

verb.definition: Treat (someone or something) with the reverence and adoration appropriate to a deity.

usage_examples: They worship at the local church.
He worships the ground she walks on.
